The claim originated from a fake news st: net, an entertainment website known for spreading false information.
The details of the claim: such as the specific location of the car accident and the absence of alcohol or drugs as factors, were provided to make it sound more convincing.
The claim was debunked by multiple sourc: including Snopes, a reputable fact-checking website, which confirmed that the story was a piece of fiction that had been circulating online since 2013.
John Cena himself: the subject of the claim, has been actively posting on social media, providing evidence of his continued existence and contradicting the rumor of his death.
